about_the_game:
CURATOR is a management video game whose goal is to build and manage your own museum.

In CURATOR, the player's imagination is the only limit. Several hundred real or fictitious works as well as many objects are made available to him in order to create galleries unimaginable before. Who hasn't dreamed of gathering all the works of *van Gogh* in the same place?! In CURATOR: it's possible!

Creating a museum is one thing, managing it is another! The player must also take care of the needs of his visitors by hiring staff, offering derivative products or even launching exclusive collaborations with other museums. He can also use marketing campaigns to increase the attendance and reputation of his museum.

Features:

  • Create incredible museums using hundreds of artworks, props and services
  • Hire and manage staff: vendors, handymen, guides, ...
  • Carefully handle your finances! The more profits you get, the more possibilities you have.
  • Diverse events system : auctions, partnerships, missions, ... there is always something to do !
  • Three different game modes (story, free play and creative) for all types of player.
